Room.Name: Silvery Corridor
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along a gold and silver corridor west of the lake.
Room.LongDescription: The majestic cavern is quite odd to see in such a strange place, especially with the lake full of sahuagin and trolls nearby. Nevertheless, the hall exists, but doesn't travel very far. To the west, you can see a massive door covered with even more gemstones and jewels. There is a strange, diamond and emerald lock on the door.
